comment: Atmospheric boundary condition for retrospective off-line experiment of Global Soil Wetness Project Phase 3 (GSWP3, 1901-01 to 2014-12)
references: Kim 2017: Global Soil Wetness Project Phase 3 Atmospheric Boundary Conditions (Experiment 1) [Data set]. Data Integration and Analysis System (DIAS). https://doi.org/10.20783/DIAS.501
source: GSWP3-EXP1 for LS3MIP-landhis (v1.1): Atmospheric boundary conditions for landhist experiment of LS3MIP
title: IIS-UTokyo GSWP3-LS3MIP dataset prepared for input4MIPs
_history_template: %s; CMOR rewrote data to be consistent with <activity_id>, CMIP6, and <Conventions> standards
